Title: Increases the dollar value of items that may legally be given or provided to any person, other than poll workers and authorized representatives, at a polling place
Summary: Increases the dollar value of items that may legally be given or provided to any person, other than persons who are official representatives of the board of elections or political parties and committees and persons who are engaged as watchers, in a polling place without any identification of the person or entity supplying such provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to increasing the dollar value of items that may legally be given or provided to any person, other than persons who are official representatives of the board of elections or political parties and committees and persons who are engaged as watchers, in a polling place without any identification of the person or entity supplying such provisions
